page.title: 06INFANT SCHOOL LYNEHAM
page.content: WE HAVE 22O CHILDREN IN OUR SCHOOL AT PRESENT, 85% OF THESE CHILDREN ARE FROM R.A.F. FAMILIES. WE HAVE A FEW CHILDREN FROM ARMY FAMILIES AND THE REMAINDER COME FROM THE VILLAGES OF LYNEHAM BRADENSTOKE AND TOCKENHAM. OURS IS A HAPPY SCHOOL WITH A WIDE AND VARIED CURRICULUM.MANY OF OUR CHIDREN HAVE TRAVELLED AROUND A GREAT DEAL AND SO OUR SCHOOL HAS TO BE A SETTLED AND CARING COMMUNITY.THE FOLLING IS WHAT THE CHILDREN THINK ABOUT THEIR SCHOOL: MY NAME IS RICHARD COLLIS AND I LIKE MY SCHOOL AND I LIKE MY TEACHER SHE IS MRS GRAY. I LIKE ART AND CRAFT AND I LIKE WRITING AND MUSIC. WE HAVE SOME TADPOLES IN A POND AT OUR SCHOOL AND WE HAVE GOT A RABBIT, CALLED "PEA_NUT". I LIKE THE BOOK_CORNER BECAUSE THERE ARE LOTS OF BOOKS.
